content.rendered:
• Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio.
  • Experience of leading a team.
  • Must have worked in an IT/Software/Technology company and familiar with tech-jargon’s.
  • Experience of designing Marketing websites, web App & Mobile App.
  • Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps
  • Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, OmniGraffle, or other visual design and wire-framing tools
  • Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for rapid prototyping.
  • Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
  • Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
  • Excellent attention to detail and the ability to prioritize and work on multiple projects in a fast-paced, changing environment.
